head.title: Dev. Wesley Ricardi - Developer full stack

header.title: I am Wesley Ricardi
header.text: A 26 years old brazilian full stack web developer. Get to know my portfolio and some information about me below.

aboutMe.title: I am passionate about programming and technology.
aboutMe.text: My interest came very early, still in childhood, I was extremely curious to know how everything worked, for this reason, I took a course in computer and network maintenance, at the time I became the youngest student in the class. From that point onwards, my desire to learn multiplied, I started to develop the desire to make websites, consequently I started to dedicate myself to studying, since the day I started I never stopped.

skills.title: My skills
skills.text: My studies took place in a completely self-taught way, they still take place that way, so all the skills I acquired were based on a lot of insistence, resilience and desire to overcome the difficulties that showed up during the process.

portfolio.title: My portfolio
portfolio.text: It was developed recently when I decided I would treat programming like a job and no longer a hobby. In order to professionalize my skills, I developed it in order to open up opportunities in the job market, for that, I made use of the most recent technologies at the time.

projects.name: E-menu
projects.description: Aims to help restaurants and their customers, optimizing the work of waiters. It was used in this application React + Next + Typescript / Rest API, as the application functions are:
list: Place order from the table, using a QR code
Customer registration and login for protection and to identify who ordered the items
The customer opens the account, he needs to set a password and pass it on to the other people at the table
Control of your own account, you can see all the items ordered and which he ordered

projects.name: WebOS
projects.description: I developed this application using React + Next + Typescript, in order to have an experience similar to an operating system in the browser, for a “multiwindow” navigation, its objective is to be used as a base for Extranet applications, its functions are:
list: Drag, minimize, maximize, change window size
Each React component can be used as a window, needing only to link to the system, from there it will be available in the start menu
It is possible to add shortcuts, in startMenu, destktop

projects.name: API
projects.description: Seeking to make an API, a kind of MVC framework like PHP 8 was developed, to facilitate my future API constructions Rest.

projects.name: My personal website
projects.description: It is about that site, had as main objective the fluidity and the search for a pleasant and modern aesthetic. It was developed completely from scratch, using only React, NextJS and Typescript, it has a rating of 91 mobile and 100 desktop in https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/
list: English and Portuguese languages, browser language based

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: I would love to hear what you think
